title: Club's Tag Bug
body:
Today me and Friend create a Club and we invite about 10 friends and all aceppted , but when i try to create the TAG it doesn't apear  to create 

~~__I want Help or somoene to explain if it is a bug or not 
__~~
Thanks__ 

SORRY BAD ENGLISH <---------------

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Sort of intentional, sort of a bug.  We intentionally disabled clug tag creation to fix some bugs that we were seeing with clubs.  At the moment, we're hoping to get the fix out with 6.10.   We've got a sticky on it, so you can check out updates on the situation [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ih5gWw8j-56-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client)
That help me a lot . Thanks Riot ❤️
